variable	p equal f_ave_p

print	"Average virial pressure from Nose-Hoover MD: $p"
Average virial pressure from Nose-Hoover MD: -1.43407173562036
unfix ave_p
#====NVT MC run====#
reset_timestep	0

unfix	1
fix		montecarlo all gcmc 1 0 125 1 32451 ${temperature} ${temperature} ${mcmaxdispl}
fix		montecarlo all gcmc 1 0 125 1 32451 0.5 ${temperature} ${mcmaxdispl}
fix		montecarlo all gcmc 1 0 125 1 32451 0.5 0.5 ${mcmaxdispl}
fix		montecarlo all gcmc 1 0 125 1 32451 0.5 0.5 0.1

fix		ave_p all ave/time ${nintervals} ${ave_one} ${prodlength} c_p_all
fix		ave_p all ave/time 40 ${ave_one} ${prodlength} c_p_all
fix		ave_p all ave/time 40 500 ${prodlength} c_p_all
fix		ave_p all ave/time 40 500 20000 c_p_all

log		log.mcnvt.txt
